<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3347</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Business English</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Englisch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Anglais d'Affaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês Do Negócio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese Di Affari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση αγγλικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés Del Negocio</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this article,which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, the writer shares some observations, ideas, thoughts and trends associated with the development of the specific area of Business English.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business English</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Artikel der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint, verbanden die Verfasseranteile einige Beobachtungen, Ideen,
Gedanken und Tendenzen mit der Entwicklung des spezifischen Bereiches 
von Geschäft Englisch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En cet article, qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, les parts d'auteur quelques observations, les idées,
les pensées et les tendances se sont associées au développement de 
la zone spécifique de l'anglais d'affaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste artigo, que se publicam no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, as partes do escritor algumas observações, as
idéias, os pensamentos e as tendências associaram com o 
desenvolvimento da área específica de inglês do negócio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo articolo, che è publicato nel PANNO 
dello scomparto di ETNI, le parti del produttore alcune osservazioni, 
le idee, i pensieri e le tendenze si sono associate con lo sviluppo 
della zona specifica dell'inglese di affari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το άρθρο, που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ 
περιοδικών ETNI, ο συγγραφέας μοιράζεται μερικές παρατηρήσεις,
ιδέες, σκέψεις και τάσεις που συνδέονται με την ανάπτυξη του 
συγκεκριμένου τομέα της επιχείρησης αγγλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este artículo, que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, las partes del programa de escritura algunas 
observaciones, las ideas, los pensamientos y las tendencias se 
asociaron al desarrollo del área específica del inglés del negocio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Anglais d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês Do Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese Di Affari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés Del Negocio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
